h1_title: Best Settings on PS5 and PC
content: Bloom and Lens flares are reduced below high, but the bigger problem I discovered was with any sort of smoke. For some reason, any setting lower than high can have a flicker in how it’s dised, so avoid going lower than High for Post Effects.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Settings_on_PS5_and_PC.md', within the main section titled 'Best Settings on PS5 and PC'.
The content is as follows:
Bloom and Lens flares are reduced below high, but the bigger problem I discovered was with any sort of smoke. For some reason, any setting lower than high can have a flicker in how it’s dised, so avoid going lower than High for Post Effects.
